scripts.start:local: npm run build && sam local invoke StripeWebhook --env-vars env-local.json -e event.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam deploy --template ./template.yaml --stack-name stripe-webhook-events-example --parameter-overrides $(jq -r 'to_entries[] | "\(.key)=\(.value)"' env.json)
scripts.deploy-local: npm run build && sam deploy --template ./template.yaml --stack-name stripe-webhook-events-example --parameter-overrides "ServicePlatform=aws StripeSecretKey=sk_test_51QD5VuGjiorgriv3adxSV5Ib0PnGQkvDDWGcs96iY9iNVwk9lEwWXhrppfx7SF1DCnJGVhKIgHDTFTq7nZXOeyvc00knEwVxeS StripeWebhookSecret=whsec_LDyxbv8JPhPG7NvdhSMKVWrxBNca8VYo StripeWebhookEventsSQS=https://sqs.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/522230339930/stripe-webhook-events-example-queue"
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && sam deploy --template ./template-dev.yaml --stack-name stripe-webhook-events-example-dev --parameter-overrides $(jq -r 'to_entries[] | "\(.key)=\(.value)"' env.json)
